{
    "claims": [
        {
            "claim_id": 1,
            "claim_text": "The Audio-Visual LLM framework synergistically aligns visual and audio signals for holistic video understanding.",
            "location": "Introduction",
            "claim_type": "Contribution",
            "exact_quote": "The Audio-Visual LLM framework synergistically aligns visual and audio signals for holistic video understanding."
        },
        {
            "claim_id": 2,
            "claim_text": "The modality-augmented training strategy enables end-to-end joint training with video data across different modalities, including visual-only, audio-only, and audio-visual formats.",
            "location": "Introduction",
            "claim_type": "Contribution",
            "exact_quote": "The modality-augmented training strategy enables end-to-end joint training with video data across different modalities, including visual-only, audio-only, and audio-visual formats."
        },
        {
            "claim_id": 3,
            "claim_text": "The high-quality video instruction dataset derived from GPT-4 allows Audio-Visual LLM to adeptly process a variety of task-oriented video instructions.",
            "location": "Introduction",
            "claim_type": "Contribution",
            "exact_quote": "The high-quality video instruction dataset derived from GPT-4 allows Audio-Visual LLM to adeptly process a variety of task-oriented video instructions."
        },

            "claim_id": 4,
            "claim_text": "The Audio-Visual LLM achieves strong zero-shot results across a range of video understanding tasks.",
            "location": "Abstract",
            "claim_type": "Performance",
            "exact_quote": "The Audio-Visual LLM achieves strong zero-shot results across a range of video understanding tasks."
        },
        {
            "claim_id": 5,
            "claim_text": "The Audio-Visual LLM achieves an accuracy of 53.7% on MSRVTT-QA, outperforming non-LLM-based InterVideo by 6.6% and LLM-based Valley by 4.4%.",
            "location": "Abstract",
            "claim_type": "Performance",
            "exact_quote": "The Audio-Visual LLM achieves an accuracy of 53.7% on MSRVTT-QA, outperforming non-LLM-based InterVideo by 6.6% and LLM-based Valley by 4.4%."
        },
        {
            "claim_id": 6,
            "claim_text": "The Audio-Visual LLM also achieves competitive performance on audio tasks (e.g., AudioCaps).",

        },

            "location": "Methods",
            "claim_type": "Performance",
